user_input: 员工的性别比例是多少?

sql2: SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS count, ROUND((COUNT(*) * 100.0) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_basic_information), 2) AS percentage FROM employee_basic_information GROUP BY gender

user_input: 哪位员工的下属最多?
sql2: SELECT supervisor_name_1, COUNT(*) AS subordinates_count FROM reporting_relationship GROUP BY supervisor_name_1 ORDER BY subordinates_count DESC LIMIT 1

user_input: 哪位员工在公司呆的时间最久?
sql1: SELECT 人员工号, 姓名, 入职日期 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese ORDER BY 入职日期 ASC LIMIT 1
sql2: SELECT id, name, starting_date_of_employment FROM employee_basic_information ORDER BY starting_date_of_employment ASC LIMIT 1

user_input: 公司今年第二季度的有效编制空缺数量是多少？
sql1: SELECT SUM(有效编制空缺) AS 第二季度有效编制空缺总数 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 编制年度 = 'T128' AND 编制月度 IN ('07', '08', '09')
sql2: SELECT SUM(quarterly_vacancy_count) AS total_vacancies FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE fiscal_year = 'T128' AND month IN ('7', '8', '9')

user_input: 公司有多少位具有博士学历的员工？
sql1: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT 人员工号) FROM a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese WHERE 学历 = '博士'
sql2: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_education_experience WHERE education = '博士';

user_input: 公司员工中，哪位的在职时间最长？
sql1: SELECT 人员工号, 姓名, 入职日期 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese WHERE 雇佣状态 = '在职' ORDER BY 入职日期 ASC LIMIT 1
sql2: SELECT * FROM employee_basic_information WHERE employment_status = '在职' ORDER BY starting_date_of_employment ASC LIMIT 1

user_input: 目前哪个职位的员工数量最多？
sql1: SELECT 职位, SUM(现职人数) AS 总人数 FROM a_sap_positions_responsibilities_risks_chinese GROUP BY 职位 ORDER BY 总人数 DESC LIMIT 1
sql2: SELECT position, COUNT(*) as number_of_employees FROM employee_basic_information GROUP BY position ORDER BY number_of_employees DESC LIMIT 1

user_input: 哪个部门的有效编制空缺数量最多？
sql1: SELECT 一级机构, SUM(有效编制空缺) AS total_vacancies FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese GROUP BY 一级机构 ORDER BY total_vacancies DESC LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT first_organization, SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies FROM employee_recruitment_plan GROUP BY first_organization ORDER BY total_vacancies DESC LIMIT 1

user_input: 哪个部门的部门负责人在岗时间最长？
sql1: SELECT 一级机构名称, 姓名, MIN(入职日期) AS 最早入职日期 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese WHERE 部门负责人 = '是' GROUP BY 一级机构名称, 姓名 ORDER BY 最早入职日期 ASC LIMIT 1
sql2: SELECT first_organization, name, starting_date_of_employment FROM employee_basic_information WHERE position_title LIKE '%manager%' AND employment_status = '在职' ORDER BY starting_date_of_employment ASC LIMIT 1

user_input: 哪个员工的直属上司在职时间最短？
sql1: 提供的表结构信息不足以生成 sql 查询。
sql2: SELECT e1.id, e1.name AS employee_name, e2.id AS supervisor_id, e2.name AS supervisor_name, e2.starting_date_of_employment FROM employee_basic_information e1 JOIN employee_basic_information e2 ON e1.direct_supervisor_id = e2.id WHERE e2.employment_status = '在职' ORDER BY e2.starting_date_of_employment DESC LIMIT 1

user_input: 公司的员工中有多少位具有海外背景的员工（即学历信息中的国家不是中国）？
sql1: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT 人员工号) FROM a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese WHERE 国家 <> '中国';
sql2: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT name) FROM employee_education_experience WHERE country != '中国';

user_input: 公司全职员工中,哪个岗位的员工平均工龄最大？
sql1: SELECT 职位, AVG(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(CURRENT_DATE, 入职日期))) AS 平均工龄 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese WHERE 雇佣状态 = '在职' GROUP BY 职位 ORDER BY 平均工龄 DESC LIMIT 1
sql2: SELECT position, AVG(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(CURRENT_DATE, starting_date_of_employment))) AS average_tenure FROM employee_basic_information WHERE employment_status = '在职' GROUP BY position ORDER BY average_tenure DESC LIMIT 1

user_input: 请列出公司各个职级范围的空缺职位数量？
sql1: SELECT 职级范围, SUM(有效编制空缺) AS 空缺职位数量 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese GROUP BY 职级范围 ORDER BY 职级范围 LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT job_level_range, SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies FROM employee_recruitment_plan GROUP BY job_level_range LIMIT 50

user_input: 请问公司当前招聘编制使用情况与编制数量各是多少？
sql1: SELECT 编制年度, SUM(有效编制空缺) AS 当前有效编制空缺总数, SUM(年度编制数量) AS 当前年度编制数量总数 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 编制年度 = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'TYYY') GROUP BY 编制年度 LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT vacancy_of_approved_position, incumbency FROM employee_recruitment_plan ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 1

user_input: 请问工号为137109的员工的姓名和入职日期是什么？
sql1: SELECT 姓名, 入职日期 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese WHERE 人员工号 = '137109' LIMIT 1;
sql2: SELECT name, date_of_onboarding FROM employee_basic_information WHERE id = '137109' LIMIT 1;

user_input: 请问算法工程师的职务和现职人数是什么？
sql1: SELECT 职务, 现职人数 FROM a_sap_positions_responsibilities_risks_chinese WHERE 岗位名称 = '算法工程师' LIMIT 50;
sql2: SELECT job_title, COUNT(*) AS current_number_of_employees FROM employee_basic_information WHERE job_title = '算法工程师' AND employment_status = '在职' GROUP BY job_title LIMIT 50;

user_input: 请问公司在T126的Q3的编制使用情况如何？
sql1: SELECT 编制年度, 编制月度, 有效编制空缺, 年度可申请空缺数量, 季度可申请空缺数量, 月度可申请空缺数量, 年度编制数量, 季度编制数量, 月度编制数量, 特批编制数量, 拟在职人数, 有效但是没有报到空缺数, open数, 关闭数, 冻结数 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 编制年度 = 'T126' AND 编制月度 IN (10, 11, 12) LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT fiscal_year, month, employee_group, vacancy_of_approved_position, annual_vacancy_count, quarterly_vacancy_count, monthly_vacancy_count, annual_headcount_current_month, quarterly_headcount_current_month, monthly_headcount_current_month, special_staffing_quantity, incumbency, number_of_ongoing_recruitments, open_count, closed_count, frozen_count FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE fiscal_year = 'T126' AND month IN (10, 11, 12) LIMIT 50

user_input: 请问工号为137109员工的汇报关系是如何的？
sql1: SELECT 直属上司工号, 直属上司姓名 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese WHERE 人员工号 = '137109'
sql2: SELECT direct_supervisor_id, direct_supervisor_name FROM employee_basic_information WHERE id = '137109'

user_input: 请问公司各个一级机构的编制使用情况和现职人数分别是多少？
sql1: SELECT s.一级机构, SUM(s.年度编制数量) AS 年度编制数量, SUM(s.季度编制数量) AS 季度编制数量, SUM(s.月度编制数量) AS 月度编制数量, SUM(p.现职人数) AS 现职人数 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese s JOIN a_sap_positions_responsibilities_risks_chinese p ON s.一级机构 = p.一级机构 GROUP BY s.一级机构 LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT e.first_organization, SUM(r.vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies, COUNT(b.id) AS current_employees FROM employee_recruitment_plan r JOIN employee_basic_information b ON r.first_organization = b.first_organization WHERE b.employment_status = '在职' GROUP BY e.first_organization LIMIT 50

user_input: 请问公司各个部门的编制使用情况和现职人数分别是多少？
sql1: SELECT srp.一级机构, SUM(srp.年度编制数量) AS 编制数量, SUM(srp.有效编制空缺) AS 编制空缺, COUNT(ei.人员工号) AS 现职人数 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese srp LEFT JOIN a_sap_employee_information_chinese ei ON srp.一级机构 = ei.一级机构名称 AND ei.雇佣状态 = '在职' GROUP BY srp.一级机构 LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT erp.first_organization, SUM(erp.vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies, COUNT(ebi.id) AS current_employees FROM employee_recruitment_plan erp LEFT JOIN employee_basic_information ebi ON erp.first_organization = ebi.first_organization WHERE ebi.employment_status = '在职' GROUP BY erp.first_organization ORDER BY erp.first_organization LIMIT 50

user_input: 请问公司中性别和学历分布的交叉情况如何？
sql1: SELECT a.性别, b.学历, COUNT(*) AS 总数 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese a JOIN a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese b ON a.人员工号 = b.人员工号 GROUP BY a.性别, b.学历 ORDER BY a.性别, b.学历 LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT ebi.gender, eee.education, COUNT(*) AS count FROM employee_basic_information ebi JOIN employee_education_experience eee ON ebi.name = eee.name GROUP BY ebi.gender, eee.education ORDER BY ebi.gender, eee.education LIMIT 50

user_input: 哪个职级范围的有效编制空缺数最多，以及该职级范围各一级机构下的空缺数分布情况是怎样的？
sql1:
WITH RankedVacancies AS (
    SELECT 职级范围, SUM(有效编制空缺) AS 总空缺数
    FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese
    GROUP BY 职级范围
    ORDER BY 总空缺数 DESC
    LIMIT 1
)
SELECT r.职级范围, a.一级机构, SUM(a.有效编制空缺) AS 机构空缺数
FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese a
INNER JOIN RankedVacancies r ON a.职级范围 = r.职级范围
GROUP BY r.职级范围, a.一级机构
ORDER BY 机构空缺数 DESC
LIMIT 50;
sql2:
WITH RankedVacancies AS (
  SELECT
    job_level_range,
    SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies
  FROM
    employee_recruitment_plan
  GROUP BY
    job_level_range
  ORDER BY
    total_vacancies DESC
  LIMIT 1
), VacancyDistribution AS (
  SELECT
    erp.first_organization,
    erp.vacancy_of_approved_position
  FROM
    employee_recruitment_plan erp
    INNER JOIN RankedVacancies rv ON erp.job_level_range = rv.job_level_range
  GROUP BY
    erp.first_organization,
    erp.vacancy_of_approved_position
)
SELECT
  first_organization,
  SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies
FROM
  VacancyDistribution
GROUP BY
  first_organization
ORDER BY
  total_vacancies DESC
LIMIT 50;

sql1: SELECT DISTINCT r.人员工号, r.姓名, r.职务名称, e.学历 FROM a_sap_reporting_relationship_chinese r INNER JOIN a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese e ON r.人员工号 = e.人员工号 WHERE (r.职务名称 LIKE '%经理%' OR r.职务名称 LIKE '%总监%') AND e.学历 IN ('硕士', '博士') LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT ebi.id, ebi.name, ebi.position, ebi.employment_status, eee.education FROM employee_basic_information ebi INNER JOIN employee_education_experience eee ON ebi.name = eee.name WHERE (ebi.position LIKE '%经理%' OR ebi.position LIKE '%总监%') AND eee.education IN ('硕士', '博士') AND ebi.employment_status = '在职' LIMIT 50

user_input: 今年是T127，7月份，请问最近一个季度中，各一级机构的招聘编制使用率是如何？需要考虑有效编制空缺和拟在职人数。
sql1: SELECT 一级机构, SUM(拟在职人数) AS 拟在职总数, SUM(有效编制空缺) AS 有效空缺总数, (SUM(拟在职人数)::FLOAT / (SUM(拟在职人数) + SUM(有效编制空缺))) AS 编制使用率 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 编制年度 = 'T127' AND 编制月度 = 'Q3' GROUP BY 一级机构 ORDER BY 编制使用率 DESC LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT first_organization, SUM(quarterly_headcount_current_month) AS total_onboard, SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancy, (SUM(quarterly_headcount_current_month)::FLOAT / (SUM(quarterly_headcount_current_month) + SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position))) AS utilization_rate FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE fiscal_year = 'T127' AND month IN ('04', '05', '06') GROUP BY first_organization ORDER BY utilization_rate DESC LIMIT 50

user_input: 我们想知道当前有多少个职位是空缺的，即有效编制空缺大于0的职位。
sql1: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 有效编制空缺 > 0;
sql2: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE vacancy_of_approved_position > 0;

user_input: 我们需要找出在职状态为'在职'且最高学历为'博士'的员工名单。
sql1: SELECT DISTINCT e.姓名 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese e INNER JOIN a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese ed ON e.人员工号 = ed.人员工号 WHERE e.雇佣状态 = '在职' AND ed.学历 = '博士' LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT DISTINCT ebi.id, ebi.name FROM employee_basic_information ebi JOIN employee_education_experience eee ON ebi.name = eee.name WHERE ebi.employment_status = '在职' AND eee.education = '博士' LIMIT 50

user_input: 目前公司拥有的员工总数，以及其中在职和离职的员工人数分别是多少？
sql1: SELECT 雇佣状态, COUNT(*) FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese GROUP BY 雇佣状态
sql2: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees, COUNT(CASE WHEN employment_status = '在职' THEN 1 END) AS active_employees, COUNT(CASE WHEN employment_status = '离职' THEN 1 END) AS inactive_employees FROM employee_basic_information

user_input: 公司今年T127,5月的编制空缺情况如何？请列出本月的有效编制空缺数以及月度可申请空缺数量。
sql1: SELECT 有效编制空缺, 月度可申请空缺数量 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 编制年度 = 'T127' AND 编制月度 = '5' LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT vacancy_of_approved_position, monthly_vacancy_count FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE fiscal_year = 'T127' AND month = 5 LIMIT 50

user_input: 分析员工教育水平及部门分布情况。每个部门的平均学历水平是什么？请返回部门和平均学历水平。
sql1: SELECT e.一级机构名称, ed.学历, COUNT(*) FROM a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese ed INNER JOIN a_sap_employee_information_chinese e ON ed.人员工号 = e.人员工号 GROUP BY e.一级机构名称, ed.学历 ORDER BY e.一级机构名称, ed.学历
sql2: 提供的表结构信息不足以生成 sql 查询。

user_input: 目前公司总共有多少空缺职位？
sql1: SELECT SUM(有效编制空缺) AS 总空缺职位数量 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese;
sql2: SELECT SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies FROM employee_recruitment_plan;

user_input: 当前具有硕士及以上学历的员工总数是多少？
sql1: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT 人员工号) FROM a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese WHERE 学历 IN ('硕士', '博士')
sql2: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_education_experience WHERE education IN ('硕士', '博士');

user_input: 公司哪个一级机构的管理岗位空缺率最高，并列出该机构的管理岗位空缺数和总编制数？
sql1: SELECT 一级机构, SUM(有效编制空缺) AS 管理岗位空缺数, SUM(年度编制数量) AS 总编制数, (SUM(有效编制空缺)::FLOAT / SUM(年度编制数量)) AS 空缺率 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 员工子组 IN ('中层管理层', '高层管理层') GROUP BY 一级机构 ORDER BY 空缺率 DESC LIMIT 1
sql2: SELECT first_organization, SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies, SUM(annual_vacancy_count) AS total_approved_positions, (SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position)::FLOAT / SUM(annual_vacancy_count)) AS vacancy_rate FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE employee_group IN ('A4', 'A5') GROUP BY first_organization ORDER BY vacancy_rate DESC LIMIT 1

user_input: 我们想知道目前公司总共有多少雇员处于正式雇佣状态。
sql1: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese WHERE 雇佣状态 = '在职';
sql2: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_basic_information WHERE employment_status = '在职';

user_input: 请问2023年Q3有多少有效编制空缺？
sql1: SELECT SUM(有效编制空缺) AS total_vacancies FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 编制年度 = 'T128' AND 编制月度 IN ('10', '11', '12')
sql2: SELECT SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE fiscal_year = 'T128' AND month IN ('10', '11', '12')

user_input: 在所有教育信息中，有多少人持有大学本科学历，并且在2021年以前入职的？
sql1: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT 人员工号) FROM a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese WHERE 学历 = '大学本科' AND 入职日期 < '2021-01-01'
sql2: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT eee.id) FROM employee_education_experience eee INNER JOIN employee_basic_information ebi ON eee.id = ebi.id WHERE eee.education = '大学本科' AND ebi.date_of_onboarding < '2021-01-01'

user_input: 目前在职的员工中，有多少人属于技术员或资深技术员职务？
sql1: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese WHERE 雇佣状态 = '在职' AND (职务名称 = '技术员' OR 职务名称 = '资深技术员')
sql2: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_basic_information WHERE employment_status = '在职' AND employee_subgroup = 'A2'

user_input: 哪个一级机构在T128年度内增加了最多的特批编制数量？
sql1: SELECT 一级机构, SUM(特批编制数量) AS total_special_quota FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 编制年度 = 'T128' GROUP BY 一级机构 ORDER BY total_special_quota DESC LIMIT 1
sql2: SELECT first_organization, SUM(special_staffing_quantity) AS total_special_staffing FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE fiscal_year = 'T128' GROUP BY first_organization ORDER BY total_special_staffing DESC LIMIT 1

user_input: 截至当前最新数据，HR部门中担任经理职务（含资深经理）的员工有多少人？
sql1: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM a_sap_reporting_relationship_chinese WHERE 一级机构 = 'HR' AND 职务名称 LIKE '%经理%'
sql2: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_basic_information WHERE first_organization = 'HR' AND position LIKE '%经理%' AND employment_status = '在职' LIMIT 50

user_input: 提供一个报告，显示所有在T127年内入职的员工，他们的姓名、入职日期和部门，按入职日期升序排序。
sql1: SELECT 姓名, 入职日期, 一级机构名称 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese WHERE 入职日期 LIKE '2022%' ORDER BY 入职日期 ASC LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT name, date_of_onboarding, first_organization FROM employee_basic_information WHERE date_of_onboarding >= '2022-01-01' AND date_of_onboarding < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_onboarding ASC LIMIT 50

user_input: 请找出2022年Q2期间入职，并且是硕士学历的员工名单。
sql1: SELECT 姓名 FROM a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese WHERE 学历 = '硕士' AND 入职日期 >= '2022-07-01' AND 入职日期 <= '2022-09-30' LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT ebi.name FROM employee_basic_information ebi JOIN employee_education_experience eee ON ebi.id = eee.id WHERE ebi.date_of_onboarding >= '2022-07-01' AND ebi.date_of_onboarding <= '2022-09-30' AND eee.education = '硕士' LIMIT 50

user_input: 当前有多少个职位在AI二级机构下空缺，并需要招聘的人数。
sql1: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT 员工子组) AS 职位空缺数, SUM(有效编制空缺) AS 需要招聘的人数 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 二级机构 = 'AI'
sql2: SELECT SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacant_positions, SUM(open_count) AS total_recruitments_needed FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE secondary_organization = 'AI' LIMIT 50

user_input: 找出所有在CPD一级机构工作，且直属上司职务为'总监'级别的员工信息。
sql1: SELECT e.人员工号, e.姓名, e.职位, e.入职日期, e.部门负责人, e.人事范围, e.员工组, e.员工子组文本, e.上班地点, e.英文名, e.性别, e.国籍, e.民族, e.籍贯, e.身份证地址的省_直辖市, e.开始参加工作日期, e.员工本人联系号码, e.一级机构名称, e.二级机构名称, e.三级机构名称, e.职务名称, e.员工工作性质文本, e.直属上司工号, e.直属上司姓名, e.集团入职日期 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese e INNER JOIN a_sap_reporting_relationship_chinese r ON e.人员工号 = r.人员工号 WHERE e.一级机构名称 = 'CPD' AND (r.职务名称 LIKE '%总监%' OR r.主管1职务 LIKE '%总监%' OR r.主管2职务 LIKE '%总监%' OR r.经理1职务 LIKE '%总监%' OR r.经理2职务 LIKE '%总监%' OR r.经理3职务 LIKE '%总监%' OR r.经理4职务 LIKE '%总监%' OR r.总监1职务 LIKE '%总监%' OR r.总监2职务 LIKE '%总监%' OR r.总监3职务 LIKE '%总监%' OR r.总监4职务 LIKE '%总监%') LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT ebi.* FROM employee_basic_information ebi INNER JOIN reporting_relationship rr ON ebi.direct_supervisor_id = rr.id WHERE ebi.first_organization = 'CPD' AND rr.supervisor_job_1 LIKE '%总监%' LIMIT 50

user_input: 请问T127年度一共有多少有效的编制空缺？
sql1: SELECT SUM(有效编制空缺) FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 编制年度 = 'T127';
sql2: SELECT SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE fiscal_year = 'T127';

user_input: 目前哪些员工的学历为硕士，并且其所在的一级机构为FE？
sql1:
SELECT DISTINCT e.人员工号, e.姓名
FROM a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese AS edu
JOIN a_sap_employee_information_chinese AS e ON edu.人员工号 = e.人员工号
WHERE edu.学历 = '硕士' AND e.一级机构名称 = 'FE'
LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT ebi.id, ebi.name, ebi.position, ebi.date_of_onboarding, ebi.first_organization FROM employee_basic_information ebi JOIN employee_education_experience eee ON ebi.id = eee.id WHERE eee.education = '硕士' AND ebi.first_organization = 'FE' LIMIT 50

user_input: 请列出目前所有一级机构下，具有本科学历且职位为技术员的员工列表。
sql1: SELECT e.人员工号, e.姓名, e.职位, e.入职日期, e.一级机构名称 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese e JOIN a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese edu ON e.人员工号 = edu.人员工号 WHERE e.职位 = '技术员' AND edu.学历 = '大学本科' AND e.雇佣状态 = '在职' LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT id, name, position, first_organization FROM employee_basic_information WHERE education = '大学本科' AND position = '技术员' AND employment_status = '在职' LIMIT 50

user_input: 目前AI二级机构下有多少有效编制空缺，以及这些空缺的年度编制数量是多少？
sql1: SELECT SUM(有效编制空缺) AS 总有效编制空缺, SUM(年度编制数量) AS 总年度编制数量 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 二级机构 = 'AI'
sql2: SELECT SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies, SUM(annual_vacancy_count) AS total_annual_vacancies FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE second_organization = 'AI'

user_input: 我们需不需要增加资深技术员的编制？如果需要，现有编制空缺数与拟在职人数之间差了多少人？
sql1: SELECT 有效编制空缺, 拟在职人数, (有效编制空缺 - 拟在职人数) AS 编制差额 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 员工子组 = '资深技术员' LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT vacancy_of_approved_position - incumbency AS difference FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE employee_group = '资深技术员' ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 1

user_input: 请问在2023年第一季度有多少有效的编制空缺？
sql1: SELECT SUM(有效编制空缺) FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 编制年度 = 'T128' AND 编制月度 IN ('1', '2', '3')
sql2: SELECT SUM(vacancy_of_approved_position) AS total_vacancies FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE fiscal_year = 'T128' AND month IN (1, 2, 3)

user_input: 当前在职的员工中，有多少人的最高学历是博士？
sql1:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT eie.人员工号) AS 博士学历人数
FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese AS eii
JOIN a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese AS eie ON eii.人员工号 = eie.人员工号
WHERE eii.雇佣状态 = '在职'
AND eie.学历 = '博士'
AND eie.结束日期 IN (
    SELECT MAX(结束日期)
    FROM a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese
    GROUP BY 人员工号
)
LIMIT 50;
sql2: SELECT COUNT(eee.id) FROM employee_education_experience eee JOIN employee_basic_information ebi ON eee.id = ebi.id WHERE eee.education = '博士' AND ebi.employment_status = '在职';

user_input: 请查询当前在职的所有'二级员工'的姓名和人员编号。
sql1: SELECT 姓名, 人员工号 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese WHERE 雇佣状态 = '在职' AND 员工子组文本 = '二级员工' LIMIT 50;
sql2: SELECT name, id FROM employee_basic_information WHERE employment_status = '在职' AND employee_subgroup_id = 'A2' LIMIT 50

user_input: 对于T128财年，查询在'AD'二级机构中，编制月度为'3'月，员工子组为'技术员'的有效编制空缺数。
sql1: SELECT 有效编制空缺 FROM a_sap_staffing_recruitment_plan_chinese WHERE 编制年度 = 'T128' AND 二级机构 = 'AD' AND 编制月度 = '3' AND 员工子组 = '技术员' LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT vacancy_of_approved_position FROM employee_recruitment_plan WHERE fiscal_year = 'T128' AND secondary_organization = 'AD' AND month = '3' AND employee_group = '技术员' LIMIT 50;

user_input: 请查询所有在APD部门任职'经理'级别且拥有硕士学历的员工的姓名、职务名称和入职日期。
sql1: SELECT e.姓名, e.职务名称, e.入职日期 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese e INNER JOIN a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese edu ON e.人员工号 = edu.人员工号 WHERE e.一级机构名称 = 'APD' AND (e.职务名称 LIKE '%主任%' OR e.职务名称 LIKE '%经理%') AND edu.学历 = '硕士' LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT ebi.name, ebi.position_title, ebi.date_of_onboarding FROM employee_basic_information ebi JOIN employee_education_experience eee ON ebi.name = eee.name WHERE ebi.first_organization = 'APD' AND ebi.position_title LIKE '%经理%' AND eee.education = '硕士' LIMIT 50

user_input: 查询'技术员'这一员工子组中个人的最新入职日期。
sql1: SELECT 入职日期 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese WHERE 员工子组文本 = '技术员' ORDER BY 入职日期 DESC LIMIT 1
sql2: SELECT MAX(date_of_onboarding) AS latest_onboarding_date FROM employee_basic_information WHERE employee_subgroup = 'A2' LIMIT 50

user_input: IDT部门的在职员工，博士学历在T128年的绩效如何？
sql1: SELECT e.姓名, e.人员工号, p.绩效 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese e JOIN a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese edu ON e.人员工号 = edu.人员工号 JOIN a_sap_performance_ai p ON e.人员工号 = p.人员工号 WHERE e.一级机构名称 = 'IDT' AND e.雇佣状态 = '在职' AND edu.学历 = '博士' AND p.编制年度 = 'T128' LIMIT 50
sql2: SELECT ebi.id, ebi.name, ep.performance FROM employee_basic_information ebi JOIN employee_education_experience eee ON ebi.id = eee.id JOIN employee_performance ep ON ebi.id = ep.id WHERE ebi.employment_status = '在职' AND ebi.first_organization = 'IDT' AND eee.education = '博士' AND ep.fin_year = 'T128' LIMIT 50

user_input: 罗文洲在T128是什么绩效，又是什么学历？
sql1: SELECT p.绩效, e.学历 FROM a_sap_performance_ai p JOIN a_sap_employee_education_experience_chinese e ON p.人员工号 = e.人员工号 WHERE p.姓名 = '罗文洲' AND p.编制年度 = 'T128' LIMIT 50;
sql2: SELECT education FROM employee_education_experience WHERE name = '罗文洲' LIMIT 50;

user_input: IDT部门的工程师在T128年和T129年的绩效如何？
sql1: SELECT e.姓名, e.人员工号, p.编制年度, p.绩效 FROM a_sap_employee_information_chinese e JOIN a_sap_performance_ai p ON e.人员工号 = p.人员工号 WHERE e.一级机构名称 = 'IDT' AND e.职务名称 LIKE '%工程师%' AND p.编制年度 IN ('T128', 'T129') LIMIT 50

user_input: IDT部门的在职工程师在T128年和T129年的绩效如何？
sql1: SELECT a.编制年度, a.姓名, a.人员工号, a.绩效 FROM a_sap_performance_ai a JOIN a_sap_employee_information_chinese b ON a.人员工号 = b.人员工号 WHERE b.一级机构名称 = 'IDT' AND b.职务名称 LIKE '%工程师%' AND b.雇佣状态 = '在职' AND a.编制年度 IN ('T128', 'T129') LIMIT 50
